org.ardenus.input.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.input.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameCubeController, KeyboardController, WirelessController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller that is used for input.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • isRightDirectionPressed

        public final boolean isRightDirectionPressed(GamepadDirection direction)
        Same as isDirectionPressed(). However, it will also check the right analog stick along with the left analog stick and directional pad.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the direction is pressed, false otherwise.
